definition: Wuzhong district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
Wuzhong district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu

sentences.english: In fact the literature of Wuzhong is the inevitable outcome of the Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 其實，吳中文學乃中國文學史發展之必然結果。

sentences.english: The eight-roomed dwelling house on No. 1500, Wuzhong Road, Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海吳中路1500號八室住宅一棟招租。

sentences.english: Take Inner Ring Road exit Wuzhong Road.
sentences.chinese: 沿着內環高架路，在吳中路出口下。

sentences.english: He'an Road, Puzhuang, Linhu Town, Wuzhong District, Suzhou.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州市吳中區臨湖鎮浦莊，合安路。

sentences.english: Wuzhong District has a long history and historic celebrities.
sentences.chinese: 吳中區歷史悠久，人文薈萃。

sentences.english: Zheng Yuanyou was of great importance to Wuzhong in the later period of Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 鄭元祐是元末吳中文壇舉足輕重的一位人物。

sentences.english: When did Wang Lai start his mathematical research in Wuzhong?
sentences.chinese: 汪萊何時始在吳中課館，習算？

definition: notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
